body_html: I just can't see a codepath that connects anything in the graph to "visible_device_list". In fact, visible_device_list is only populated here: https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/master/tensorflow/core/common_runtime/gpu/gpu_device.cc#L525, which comes from the ConfigProto.
body_text: I just can't see a codepath that connects anything in the graph to "visible_device_list".  In fact, visible_device_list is only populated here: https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/master/tensorflow/core/common_runtime/gpu/gpu_device.cc#L525, which comes from the ConfigProto.
body: I just can't see a codepath that connects anything in the graph to "visible_device_list".  In fact, visible_device_list is _only_ populated here: https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/master/tensorflow/core/common_runtime/gpu/gpu_device.cc#L525, which comes from the ConfigProto.
